attributes.action: MAKE IT A LOT HARDER FOR THIEVES TO SELL COPPER, LEAD, ETC TO SCRAP MERCHANTS FOR CASH
attributes.additional_details: Make it a lot harder for thieves to sell copper,lead,metal etc to scrap merchants, the vandalism of our, war memorials railways, industrial sites is a disgrace and should be stopped as soon as possible before there is a loss of life, particularly electrical wiring, and the damage to human life
